mapper.sql: PRF_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, ANA_END_DTM, ANA_DGR, ANA_CNT, ESN_ER_CNT, ANA_LOG_ID, ANA_USER_ID

SELECT R.*
FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT
WHERE ANA_DGR =#{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
GROUP BY PRF_ID ) R2 ON R.PRF_ID = R2.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM
mapper.insert: insert into WAM_PRF_RESULT (PRF_ID, ANA_STR_DTM, ANA_END_DTM, ANA_DGR, ANA_CNT, ESN_ER_CNT, ANA_LOG_ID, ANA_USER_ID) values (#{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anaCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{esnErCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{anaLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{anaUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into WAM_PRF_RESULT
PRF_ID,
ANA_STR_DTM,
ANA_END_DTM,
ANA_DGR,
ANA_CNT,
ESN_ER_CNT,
ANA_LOG_ID,
ANA_USER_ID,
#{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{anaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{anaCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{esnErCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{anaLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{anaUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update WAM_PRF_RESULT
ANA_END_DTM = #{anaEndDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
ANA_DGR = #{anaDgr,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANA_CNT = #{anaCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ESN_ER_CNT = #{esnErCnt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ANA_LOG_ID = #{anaLogId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ANA_USER_ID = #{anaUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PRF_ID = #{prfId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ANA_STR_DTM = #{anaStrDtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}
mapper.select: SELECT R.PRF_ID ,TO_CHAR(R.ANA_STR_DTM, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') AS SCH_ANA_STR_DTM ,GET_USER_NM(R.ANA_USER_ID) AS ANA_USER_NM ,R.ANA_DGR ,R.ANA_CNT ,R.ESN_ER_CNT ,R.NULL_CNT ,R.SPACE_CNT ,R.MIN_VAL1 ,R.MIN_VAL2 ,R.MIN_VAL3 ,R.MAX_VAL1 ,R.MAX_VAL2 ,R.MAX_VAL3 ,R.MIN_LEN ,R.MAX_LEN ,R.STDDEV_VAL ,R.VARIANCE_VAL ,R.AVG_VAL ,R.UNQ_CNT ,R.MIN_CNT_VAL ,R.MAX_CNT_VAL FROM (SELECT M.* FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M WHERE PRF_KND_CD = 'PC01' AND (M.DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,M.DB_SCH_ID, M.DBC_TBL_NM, M.OBJ_NM) IN (SELECT DB_CONN_TRG_ID ,DB_SCH_ID ,DBC_TBL_NM ,OBJ_NM FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR M WHERE PRF_ID = #{objId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND REG_TYP_CD IN ('C','U') ) ) M INNER JOIN ( SELECT R.* FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT R INNER JOIN (SELECT PRF_ID, MAX(ANA_STR_DTM) AS ANA_STR_DTM FROM WAM_PRF_RESULT GROUP BY PRF_ID ) R2 ON R.PRF_ID = R2.PRF_ID AND R.ANA_STR_DTM = R2.ANA_STR_DTM) R ON M.PRF_ID = R.PRF_ID

SELECT A.PRF_ID ,B.ANA_DGR ,B.MIN_VAL1 ,B.MAX_VAL1 ,CASE WHEN REGEXP_INSTR(B.STDDEV_VAL,'^[+-]?\d*(\.?\d*)$') = 1 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(B.STDDEV_VAL, 2)) ELSE B.STDDEV_VAL END AS STDDEV_VAL ,CASE WHEN REGEXP_INSTR(B.AVG_VAL,'^[+-]?\d*(\.?\d*)$') = 1 THEN TO_CHAR(ROUND(B.AVG_VAL, 2)) ELSE B.AVG_VAL END AS AVG_VAL FROM WAM_PRF_MSTR A INNER JOIN WAM_PRF_RESULT B ON B.PRF_ID = A.PRF_ID WHERE A.PRF_ID = #{prfId} AND B.ANA_DGR IS NOT NULL AND A.PRF_KND_CD = 'PC01' ORDER BY B.ANA_DGR
